articles.title: Stephen King Damns Trump With Faint Praise, Lists 3 Things He’s ‘Delivering’
articles.description: It follows the horror writer's similar criticism of Texas senator Ted Cruz.

articles.title: Melania Trump Spokeswoman Furious About Report On $95,000 Cairo Hotel Bill
articles.description: Stephanie Grisham lashed "irresponsible journalism" over early reports that the first lady spent that much for the night  when she was there just six hours.
